text: Beit HaNassi ("President's House" in Hebrew), also known as Mishkan HaNassi ( "Presidential Residence") is the main residence of the President of Israel. It is in Jerusalem. The building was opened in 1971, after the Israeli government approved a state home for the president. In 2011, renovations were started after defects were found in the building. == Other websites == * President of Israel - official website Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Government buildings in Israel
title: Beit HaNassi
